component-description.author: Andre Fischer
component-description.name: AccessibleDrawDocumentView
component-description.description: This component represents the accessbility object for Draw document views and Impress document views with the view modes edit view, notes view, or handout view. For more detailed information see the documentation of the supported services and the link to the general accessibility documentation.

reference-docu.title: Link to a general description of UNO accessibility

component-description.author: Andre Fischer
component-description.name: AccessibleOutlineView
component-description.description: This component represents the accessbility object for Impress document views in outline view mode. For more detailed information see the documentation of the supported services and the link to the general accessibility documentation.

reference-docu.title: Link to a general description of UNO accessibility

component-description.author: Andre Fischer
component-description.name: AccessiblePageShape
component-description.description: This component is derived from AccessibleShape and makes the graphical representation of the currently visible draw page accessible. For more detailed information see the documentation of the base component AccessibleShape, the supported services, and the link to the general accessibility documentation.

reference-docu.title: Link to a general description of UNO accessibility

component-description.author: Andre Fischer
component-description.name: AccessiblePresentationGraphicShape
component-description.description: This component is derived from AccessibleGraphicShape and implements Impress specific behaviour. For more detailed information see the documentation of the base component AccessibleGraphicShape, the supported services, and the link to the general accessibility documentation.

reference-docu.title: Link to a general description of UNO accessibility

component-description.author: Andre Fischer
component-description.name: AccessiblePresentationOLEShape
component-description.description: This component is derived from AccessibleOLEShape and implements Impress specific behaviour. For more detailed information see the documentation of the base component AccessibleOLEShape, the supported services, and the link to the general accessibility documentation.

reference-docu.title: Link to a general description of UNO accessibility

component-description.author: Andre Fischer
component-description.name: AccessiblePresentationShape
component-description.description: This component represents the accessbility object of generic presentation shapes. For more detailed information see the documentation of the base component AccessibleShape, the supported services, and the link to the general accessibility documentation.

reference-docu.title: Link to a general description of UNO accessibility

component-description.author: Andre Fischer
component-description.name: AccessibleSlideView
component-description.description: This component represents the accessbility object for Impress document views in slide view mode. For more detailed information see the documentation of the supported services and the link to the general accessibility documentation.

reference-docu.title: Link to a general description of UNO accessibility

component-description.author: Andre Fischer
component-description.name: AccessibleSlideView
component-description.description: This component represents the accessbility object for the slides managed by Impress slide view. For more detailed information see the documentation of the supported services and the link to the general accessibility documentation.

reference-docu.title: Link to a general description of UNO accessibility

component-description.author: Christian Lippka
component-description.name: DrawController_DrawView
component-description.description: specifies a document which consists of multiple pages with drawings.

component-description.author: Christian Lippka
component-description.name: DrawController_HandoutView
component-description.description: This componend integrates a view to a handout page inside a presentation document into the desktop

component-description.author: Christian Lippka
component-description.name: DrawController_NotesView
component-description.description: This componend integrates a view to a handout page inside a presentation document into the desktop.

component-description.author: Christian Lippka
component-description.name: DrawController_OutlineView
component-description.description: This componend integrates an outline view to a presentation document into the desktop.

component-description.author: Christian Lippka
component-description.name: DrawController_PresentationView
component-description.description: This componend integrates a view to a slide show of a presentation document into the desktop.

component-description.author: Christian Lippka
component-description.name: com.sun.star.comp.office.SdDocLinkTargets
component-description.description: This component provides access to possible link targets inside a context

component-description.author: Christian Lippka
component-description.name: com.sun.star.comp.office.SdDrawPage
component-description.description: This component provides access to a single drawing page of a document.

component-description.author: Christian Lippka
component-description.name: com.sun.star.comp.office.SdDrawPagesAccess
component-description.description: This component provides access to the drawing pages of a document.

component-description.author: Christian Lippka
component-description.name: com.sun.star.comp.office.SdGenericDrawPage
component-description.description: This component provides a basic implementation for both master and drawing pages.

component-description.author: Christian Lippka
component-description.name: com.sun.star.comp.office.SdLayer
component-description.description: This component provides access to a single layer inside a document.

component-description.author: Christian Lippka
component-description.name: com.sun.star.comp.office.SdLayerManager
component-description.description: This component provides access to the layers of a document

component-description.author: Christian Lippka
component-description.name: com.sun.star.comp.office.SdMasterPage
component-description.description: This component provides access to a single master page inside a document

component-description.author: Christian Lippka
component-description.name: com.sun.star.comp.office.SdMasterPagesAccess
component-description.description: This component provides access to the master drawing pages inside a document

component-description.author: Christian Lippka
component-description.name: com.sun.star.comp.office.SdPageLinkTargets
component-description.description: This component provides the container for the link targets of a drawing page

component-description.author: Christian Lippka
component-description.name: com.sun.star.comp.office.SdXCustomPresentation
component-description.description: This component provides access to the draw pages in a custom presentation

component-description.author: Christian Lippka
component-description.name: com.sun.star.comp.office.SdXCustomPresentationAccess
component-description.description: This component provides access to custom presentations of a document

component-description.author: Christian Lippka
component-description.name: com.sun.star.comp.office.SdXImpressDocument
component-description.description: This component provides access to an presentation document.

component-description.author: Christian Lippka
component-description.name: com.sun.star.comp.office.SdXPresentation
component-description.description: This component provides access to the presentation of a impress document

component-description.author: Christian Lippka
component-description.name: com.sun.star.comp.office.SdXShape
component-description.description: This component provides access to a single shape.

component-description.author: Christian Lippka
component-description.name: SdUnoSlideView
component-description.description: This componend integrates a slides view to a presentation document into the desktop.
